hero.title: The PDF Toolkit built for privacy.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast

tools.heading: Get Started with Tools
tools.description: Click a tool to open the file uploader

toolSubtitles.split: Extract a range of pages into a new PDF.
toolSubtitles.compress: Reduce the file size of your PDF.
toolSubtitles.edit: Annotate, highlight, redact, comment, add shapes/images, search, and view PDFs
toolSubtitles.jpgtopdf: Create a PDF from one or more JPG images.
toolSubtitles.signpdf: Draw, type, or upload your signature.
toolSubtitles.cropper: Trim the margins of every page in your PDF.
toolSubtitles.extractpages: Save a selection of pages as new files.
toolSubtitles.deletepages: Remove specific pages from your document.
toolSubtitles.addpagenumbers: Insert page numbers into your document.
toolSubtitles.addwatermark: Stamp text or an image over your PDF pages.
toolSubtitles.addheaderfooter: Add text to the top and bottom of pages.
toolSubtitles.invertcolors: Create a "dark mode" version of your PDF.
toolSubtitles.changebackgroundcolor: Change the background color of your PDF.
toolSubtitles.changetextcolor: Change the color of text in your PDF.
toolSubtitles.formfiller: Fill in forms directly in the browser.
toolSubtitles.removeblankpages: Automatically detect and delete blank pages.
toolSubtitles.imagetopdf: Combine various images into one PDF.
toolSubtitles.pngtopdf: Create a PDF from one or more PNG images.
toolSubtitles.webptopdf: Create a PDF from one or more WebP images.
toolSubtitles.svgtopdf: Create a PDF from one or more SVG images.
toolSubtitles.bmptopdf: Create a PDF from one or more BMP images.
toolSubtitles.heictopdf: Create a PDF from one or more HEIC images.
toolSubtitles.tifftopdf: Create a PDF from one or more TIFF images.
toolSubtitles.txttopdf: Convert a plain text file into a PDF.
toolSubtitles.pdftojpg: Convert each PDF page into a JPG image.
toolSubtitles.pdftopng: Convert each PDF page into a PNG image.
toolSubtitles.pdftowebp: Convert each PDF page into a WebP image.
toolSubtitles.pdftobmp: Convert each PDF page into a BMP image.
toolSubtitles.pdftotiff: Convert each PDF page into a TIFF image.
toolSubtitles.pdftogreyscale: Convert all colors to black and white.
toolSubtitles.ocrpdf: Make a PDF searchable and copyable.
toolSubtitles.alternatemerge: Combine PDFs by alternating pages from each.
toolSubtitles.organize: Reorder pages by dragging and dropping.
toolSubtitles.addattachments: Embed one or more files into your PDF.
toolSubtitles.addblankpage: Insert an empty page anywhere in your PDF.
toolSubtitles.reversepages: Flip the order of all pages in your document.
toolSubtitles.nup: Arrange multiple pages onto a single sheet.
toolSubtitles.combinesinglepage: Stitch all pages into one continuous scroll.
toolSubtitles.viewmetadata: Inspect the hidden properties of your PDF.
toolSubtitles.editmetadata: Change the author, title, and other properties.
toolSubtitles.pdftozip: Package multiple PDF files into a ZIP archive.
toolSubtitles.comparepdfs: Compare two PDFs side by side.
toolSubtitles.posterize: Split a large page into multiple smaller pages.
toolSubtitles.fixdimensions: Standardize all pages to a uniform size.
toolSubtitles.linearize: Optimize PDF for fast web viewing.
toolSubtitles.pagedimensions: Analyze page size, orientation, and units.
toolSubtitles.removerestrictions: Remove password protection and security restrictions associated with digitally signed PDF files.
toolSubtitles.encrypt: Lock your PDF by adding a password.
toolSubtitles.sanitizepdf: Remove metadata, annotations, scripts, and more.
toolSubtitles.decrypt: Unlock PDF by removing password protection.
toolSubtitles.flatten: Make form fields and annotations non-editable.
toolSubtitles.removemetadata: Strip hidden data from your PDF.
toolSubtitles.changepermissions: Set or change user permissions on a PDF.

security.heading:
Your data never leaves your device We keep
your information safe by following global security standards.
security.subheading: All the processing happens locally on your device.

gdpr.title: GDPR compliance
gdpr.description: Protects the personal data and privacy of individuals within the European Union.

ccpa.title: CCPA compliance
ccpa.description: Gives California residents rights over how their personal information is collected, used, and shared.

hipaa.title: HIPAA compliance
hipaa.description: Sets safeguards for handling sensitive health information in the United States healthcare system.

q1.question: Is BentoPDF really free?
q1.answer: Yes, absolutely. All tools on BentoPDF are 100% free to use, with no file limits, no sign-ups, and no watermarks. We believe everyone deserves access to simple, powerful PDF tools without a paywall.

q2.question: Are my files secure? Where are they processed?
q2.answer: Your files are as secure as possible because they **never leave your computer**. All processing happens directly in your web browser (client-side). We never upload your files to a server, so you maintain complete privacy and control over your documents.

q3.question: Does it work on Mac, Windows, and Mobile?
q3.answer: Yes! Since BentoPDF runs entirely in your browser, it works on any operating system with a modern web browser, including Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.

q4.question: Is BentoPDF GDPR compliant?
q4.answer: Yes. BentoPDF is fully GDPR compliant. Since all file processing happens locally in your browser and we never collect or transmit your files to any server, we have no access to your data. This ensures you are always in control of your documents.

q5.question: Do you store or track any of my files?
q5.answer: No. We never store, track, or log your files. Everything you do on BentoPDF happens in your browser memory and disappears once you close the page. There are no uploads, no history logs, and no servers involved.

q6.question: What makes BentoPDF different from other PDF tools?
q6.answer: Most PDF tools upload your files to a server for processing. BentoPDF never does that. We use secure, modern web technology to process your files directly in your browser. This means faster performance, stronger privacy, and complete peace of mind.

q7.question: Can I use BentoPDF offline?
q7.answer: Yes! Once you load the page, you can use most tools offline. Your browser caches the necessary files, so you can process PDFs without an internet connection.

q8.question: What file size limit does BentoPDF have?
q8.answer: Since everything happens in your browser, the limit depends on your device's memory and browser capabilities. In most cases, BentoPDF can easily handle PDFs up to several hundred megabytes.

merge.heading: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine whole files, or select specific pages to merge into a new document.
merge.fileModeInstruction1: Click and drag the icon to change the order of the files.
merge.fileModeInstruction2: In the "Pages" box for each file, you can specify ranges (e.g., "1-3, 5") to merge only those pages.
merge.fileModeInstruction3: Leave the "Pages" box blank to include all pages from that file.
merge.pageModeInstruction1: All pages from your uploaded PDFs are shown below.
merge.pageModeInstruction2: Simply drag and drop the individual page thumbnails to create the exact order you want for your new file.

split.heading: Split PDF
split.description: Extract pages from a PDF using various methods.
split.modeAll: Split All Pages into Separate Files
split.rangeInstruction1: Enter page numbers separated by commas (e.g., 2, 8, 14).
split.rangeInstruction2: Enter page ranges using a hyphen (e.g., 5-10).
split.evenOddDescription: This will create a new PDF containing only the even or only the odd pages from your original document.
split.visualDescription: Click on the page thumbnails below to select them. Click again to deselect. All selected pages will be extracted.
split.allPagesDescription: This mode will create a separate PDF file for every single page in your document and download them together in one ZIP archive.
split.zipOptionLabel: Download pages as individual files in a ZIP

compress.heading: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce file size by choosing the compression method that best suits your document.
compress.algorithmNote: Choose 'Vector' for text based PDFs, or 'Photon' for scanned documents and complex images.

encrypt.heading: Encrypt PDF
encrypt.description: Add 256-bit AES password protection to your PDF.
encrypt.userPasswordHelp: Required to open and view the PDF
encrypt.ownerPasswordHelp: Allows changing permissions and removing encryption
encrypt.securityNote: For strong security, set both passwords. Without an owner password, the security restrictions (printing, copying, etc.) can be easily bypassed.
encrypt.encryptionNote: 256-bit AES encryption without quality loss. Text remains selectable and searchable.

decrypt.heading: Decrypt PDF
decrypt.description: Upload an encrypted PDF and provide its password to create an unlocked version.

organize.heading: Organize PDF
organize.description: Reorder, rotate, or delete pages. Drag and drop pages to reorder them.

rotate.heading: Rotate PDF
rotate.description: Rotate all or specific pages in a PDF document.

addPageNumbers.heading: Add Page Numbers
addPageNumbers.description: Add customizable page numbers to your PDF file.

pdfToJpg.heading: PDF to JPG
pdfToJpg.description: Convert each page of a PDF file into a high-quality JPG image.
pdfToJpg.previewText: Click "Download All as ZIP" to get images for all pages.

jpgToPdf.heading: JPG to PDF
jpgToPdf.description: Convert one or more JPG images into a single PDF file.

scanToPdf.heading: Scan to PDF
scanToPdf.description: Use your device's camera to scan documents and save them as a PDF. On desktop, this will open a file picker.

crop.heading: Crop PDF
crop.description: Click and drag to select a crop area on any page. You can set different crop areas for each page.

pdfToGreyscale.heading: PDF to Greyscale
pdfToGreyscale.description: Convert all pages of a PDF to greyscale. This is done by rendering each page, applying a filter, and rebuilding the PDF.

pdfToZip.heading: Combine PDFs into ZIP
pdfToZip.description: Select multiple PDF files to download them together in a single ZIP archive.

editMetadata.heading: Edit PDF Metadata
editMetadata.description: Modify the core metadata fields of your PDF. Leave a field blank to clear it.
editMetadata.noteText: This tool pdf-lib library, which may update the Producer, CreationDate, and ModDate fields due to its default behavior on upload. To accurately view a file's final metadata after editing, or just normal viewing, please use our View Metadata tool.
editMetadata.customFieldsNote: Note: Custom fields are not supported by all PDF readers.

removeMetadata.heading: Remove PDF Metadata
removeMetadata.description: Completely remove identifying metadata from your PDF.

flatten.heading: Flatten PDF
flatten.description: Make PDF forms and annotations non-editable by flattening them.

pdfToPng.heading: PDF to PNG
pdfToPng.description: Convert each page of a PDF file into a high-quality PNG image.
pdfToPng.previewText: Your file is ready. Click the button to download a ZIP file containing all PNG images.

pngToPdf.heading: PNG to PDF
pngToPdf.description: Convert one or more PNG images into a single PDF file.

pdfToWebp.heading: PDF to WebP
pdfToWebp.description: Convert each page of a PDF file into a modern WebP image.
pdfToWebp.previewText: Your file is ready. Click the button to download a ZIP file containing all WebP images.

webpToPdf.heading: WebP to PDF
webpToPdf.description: Convert one or more WebP images into a single PDF file.

edit.heading: PDF Studio
edit.description: An all-in-one PDF workspace where you can annotate, draw, highlight, redact, add comments and shapes, take screenshots, and view PDFs.

deletePages.heading: Delete Pages
deletePages.description: Remove specific pages or ranges of pages from your PDF file.

addBlankPage.heading: Add Blank Pages
addBlankPage.description: Insert one or more blank pages at a specific position in your document.
addBlankPage.positionLabel: Insert blank pages after page number:
addBlankPage.positionPlaceholder: Enter 0 to add to the beginning
addBlankPage.countLabel: Number of blank pages to insert:

extractPages.heading: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Extract specific pages from a PDF into separate files. Your files will download in a ZIP archive.

addWatermark.heading: Add Watermark
addWatermark.description: Apply a text or image watermark to every page of your PDF document.

addHeaderFooter.heading: Add Header & Footer
addHeaderFooter.description: Add custom text to the top and bottom margins of every page.

imageToPdf.heading: Image to PDF Converter
imageToPdf.description: Combine multiple images into a single PDF. Drag and drop to reorder.

changePermissions.heading: Change PDF Permissions
changePermissions.description: Modify passwords and permissions without losing quality.
changePermissions.currentPasswordPlaceholder: Leave blank if PDF is not password-protected
changePermissions.howItWorksItem1: User Password: Required to open the PDF
changePermissions.howItWorksItem2: Owner Password: Required to enforce the permissions below
changePermissions.howItWorksItem3: Leave both blank to remove all encryption and restrictions
changePermissions.howItWorksItem4: Check boxes below to ALLOW specific actions (unchecked = disabled)

pdfToMarkdown.heading: PDF to Markdown
pdfToMarkdown.description: Convert a PDF's text content into a structured Markdown file.
pdfToMarkdown.noteText: This is a text-focused conversion. Tables and images will not be included.

txtToPdf.heading: Text to PDF
txtToPdf.description: Type or paste your text below and convert it to a PDF with custom formatting.

invertColors.heading: Invert PDF Colors
invertColors.description: Convert your PDF to a "dark mode" by inverting its colors. This works best on simple text and image documents.

viewMetadata.heading: View PDF Metadata
viewMetadata.description: Upload a PDF to view its internal properties, such as Title, Author, and Creation Date.

reversePages.heading: Reverse PDF Pages
reversePages.description: Flip the order of all pages in your document, making the last page the first.

mdToPdf.heading: Markdown to PDF
mdToPdf.description: Write in Markdown, select your formatting options, and get a high-quality, multi-page PDF.
mdToPdf.note: Note: Images linked from the web (e.g., https://...) require an internet connection to be rendered.

svgToPdf.heading: SVG to PDF
svgToPdf.description: Convert one or more SVG vector images into a single PDF file.

bmpToPdf.heading: BMP to PDF
bmpToPdf.description: Convert one or more BMP images into a single PDF file.

heicToPdf.heading: HEIC to PDF
heicToPdf.description: Convert one or more HEIC (High Efficiency) images from your iPhone or camera into a single PDF file.

tiffToPdf.heading: TIFF to PDF
tiffToPdf.description: Convert one or more single or multi-page TIFF images into a single PDF file.

pdfToBmp.heading: PDF to BMP
pdfToBmp.description: Convert each page of a PDF file into a BMP image. Your files will be downloaded in a ZIP archive.

pdfToTiff.heading: PDF to TIFF
pdfToTiff.description: Convert each page of a PDF file into a high-quality TIFF image. Your files will be downloaded in a ZIP archive.

splitInHalf.heading: Split Pages in Half
splitInHalf.description: Choose a method to divide every page of your document into two separate pages.

pageDimensions.heading: Analyze Page Dimensions
pageDimensions.description: Upload a PDF to see the precise dimensions, standard size, and orientation of every page.

nUp.heading: N-Up Page Arrangement
nUp.description: Combine multiple pages from your PDF onto a single sheet. This is great for creating booklets or proof sheets.

duplicateOrganize.heading: Page Manager
duplicateOrganize.description: Drag pages to reorder them. Use the icon to duplicate a page or the icon to delete it.

combineSinglePage.heading: Combine to a Single Page
combineSinglePage.description: Stitch all pages of your PDF together vertically to create one continuous, scrollable page.
combineSinglePage.addSeparatorLabel: Draw a separator line between pages

fixDimensions.heading: Standardize Page Dimensions
fixDimensions.description: Convert all pages in your PDF to a uniform size. Choose a standard format or define a custom dimension.
fixDimensions.scalingFitDescription: Preserves all content, may add white bars.
fixDimensions.scalingFillDescription: Covers the page, may crop content.

changeBackgroundColor.heading: Change Background Color
changeBackgroundColor.description: Select a new background color for every page of your PDF.

changeTextColor.heading: Change Text Color
changeTextColor.description: Change the color of dark text in your PDF. This process converts pages to images, so text will not be selectable in the final file.

comparePdfs.heading: Compare PDFs
comparePdfs.description: Upload two files to visually compare them using either an overlay or a side-by-side view.

ocrPdf.heading: OCR PDF
ocrPdf.description: Convert scanned PDFs into searchable documents. Select one or more languages present in your file for the best results.
ocrPdf.howItWorksExtract: Extract Text: Uses Tesseract OCR to recognize text from scanned images or PDFs.
ocrPdf.howItWorksSearchable: Searchable Output: Creates a new PDF with an invisible text layer, making your document fully searchable while preserving the original appearance.
ocrPdf.howItWorksFiltering: Character Filtering: Use whitelists to filter out unwanted characters and improve accuracy for specific document types (invoices, forms, etc.).
ocrPdf.howItWorksMultiLang: Multi-language Support: Select multiple languages for documents containing mixed language content.
ocrPdf.binarizeLabel: Binarize Image (Enhance Contrast for Clean Scans)
ocrPdf.whitelistHelp: Only these characters will be recognized. Leave empty for all characters.
ocrPdf.ocrCompleteText: Your searchable PDF is ready. You can also copy or download the extracted text below.

wordToPdf.heading: Word to PDF Converter
wordToPdf.description: Upload a .docx file to convert it into a high-quality PDF with selectable text. Complex layouts may not be perfectly preserved.

signPdf.heading: Sign PDF
signPdf.description: Create your signature, select it, then click on the document to place. You can drag to move placed signatures.
signPdf.savedSignaturesEmpty: Your saved signatures will appear here. Click one to select it.

removeAnnotations.heading: Remove Annotations
removeAnnotations.description: Select the types of annotations to remove from all pages or a specific range.

cropper.heading: PDF Cropper
cropper.description: Upload a PDF to visually crop one or more pages. This tool offers a live preview and two distinct cropping modes.
cropper.livePreview: Live Preview: See your crop selection in real-time before you apply it.
cropper.nonDestructive: Non-Destructive Mode: This is the default mode. It simply "hides" the cropped content by adjusting the page's boundaries. The original text and data are preserved in the file.
cropper.destructive: Destructive Mode: This option permanently removes the cropped content by flattening the PDF. Use this for maximum security and smaller file size, but note that it will remove selectable text.
cropper.statusText: Please select a PDF file to begin.

formFiller.heading: PDF Form Filler
formFiller.description: Upload a PDF to fill in existing form fields. The PDF view on the right will update as you type.
formFiller.noFieldsText: Upload a file to see form fields here.

posterize.heading: Posterize PDF
posterize.description: Split pages into multiple smaller sheets to print as a poster. Navigate the preview and see the grid update based on your settings.
posterize.scalingFitDescription: Preserves all content, may add margins.
posterize.scalingFillDescription: Fills the page, may crop content.

removeBlankPages.heading: Remove Blank Pages
removeBlankPages.description: Automatically detect and remove blank or nearly blank pages from your PDF. Adjust the sensitivity to control what is considered "blank".
removeBlankPages.sensitivityHelp: Higher sensitivity requires pages to be more "blank" to be removed.

alternateMerge.heading: Alternate & Mix Pages
alternateMerge.description: Combine pages from 2 or more documents, alternating between them. Drag the files to set the mixing order (e.g., Page 1 from Doc A, Page 1 from Doc B, Page 2 from Doc A, Page 2 from Doc B, etc.).
alternateMerge.howItWorksItem1: The tool will take one page from each document in the order you specify below, then repeat for the next page until all pages are used.
alternateMerge.howItWorksItem2: If a document runs out of pages, it will be skipped, and the tool will continue alternating with the remaining documents.

linearize.heading: Linearize PDFs (Fast Web View)
linearize.description: Optimize multiple PDFs for faster loading over the web. Files will be downloaded in a ZIP archive.

addAttachments.heading: Add Attachments to PDF
addAttachments.description: First, upload the PDF document you want to add files to.
addAttachments.uploadDescription: Select one or more files to embed within the PDF. You can attach any file type (images, documents, spreadsheets, etc.).
addAttachments.uploadHelpText: Any file type, multiple files allowed

sanitizePdf.heading: Sanitize PDF
sanitizePdf.description: Remove potentially sensitive or unnecessary information from your PDF before sharing. Select the items you want to remove.
sanitizePdf.warningNote: Note: Removing Embedded Fonts may break text rendering! Text may not display correctly or at all. Only use if you're sure the PDF viewer has substitute fonts.

removeRestrictions.heading: Remove PDF Restrictions
removeRestrictions.description: Remove security restrictions and unlock PDF permissions for editing and printing.
removeRestrictions.howItWorksItem1: Remove all permission restrictions (printing, copying, editing)
removeRestrictions.howItWorksItem2: Remove encryption even if the file is encrypted
removeRestrictions.howItWorksItem3: Remove security restrictions associated with digitally signed PDF files (will make signature invalid)
removeRestrictions.howItWorksItem4: Create a fully editable, unrestricted PDF
removeRestrictions.ownerPasswordPlaceholder: Leave empty if PDF has no password
removeRestrictions.ownerPasswordHelp: Enter the owner password if the PDF is password-protected
removeRestrictions.noticeText: This tool is intended for legitimate purposes only, such as:
removeRestrictions.noticeItem1: Removing restrictions from PDFs you own or have permission to modify
removeRestrictions.noticeItem2: Recovering access to a PDF when you legitimately forgot the password
removeRestrictions.noticeItem3: Accessing content you legally purchased or created
removeRestrictions.noticeItem4: Editing documents for authorized business purposes
removeRestrictions.noticeItem5: Opening documents for legitimate archival, compliance, or recovery workflows
removeRestrictions.limitationText: Limitations: this tool can only remove restrictions from weakly protected PDFs or PDFs that do not have an owner password set. It cannot remove or bypass properly applied AES‑256 (256‑bit) encryption.
removeRestrictions.legalWarning: Using this tool to bypass copyright protections, violate intellectual property rights, or access documents without authorization may be illegal in your jurisdiction. We are not liable for any misuse of this tool — if you're unsure, consult legal counsel or the document owner before proceeding.

common.dragDropFiles: Drag & drop files here or click to browse

contact.title: Contact Us - BentoPDF
contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, feedback, or a feature request, please don't hesitate to reach out.
contact.emailText: You can reach us directly by email at:

about.title: About BentoPDF - Fast, Private, and Free PDF Tools
about.heading: We believe PDF tools should be fast, private, and free.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the most comprehensive PDF toolbox that respects your privacy and never asks for payment. We believe essential document tools should be accessible to everyone, everywhere, without barriers.

philosophy.label: Our Core Philosophy
philosophy.title: Privacy First. Always.
philosophy.description: In an era where data is a commodity, we take a different approach. All processing for BentoPDF tools happens locally in your browser. This means your files never touch our servers, we never see your documents, and we don't track what you do. Your documents remain completely and unequivocally private. It's not just a feature; it's our foundation.

speed.title: Built for Speed
speed.description: No waiting for uploads or downloads to a server. By processing files directly in your browser using modern web technologies like WebAssembly, we offer unparalleled speed for all our tools.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No trials, no subscriptions, no hidden fees, and no "premium" features held hostage. We believe powerful PDF tools should be a public utility, not a profit center.

noAccount.title: No Account Required
noAccount.description: Start using any tool immediately. We don't need your email, a password, or any personal information. Your workflow should be frictionless and anonymous.

openSource.title: Open Source Spirit
openSource.description: Built with transparency in mind. We leverage incredible open-source libraries like PDF-lib and PDF.js, and believe in the community-driven effort to make powerful tools accessible to everyone.

cta.heading: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust BentoPDF for their daily document needs. Experience the difference that privacy and performance can make.
